@graph.caption: A loaf of faux sourdough bread on an orange and green gingham fabric

@graph.name: Faux Sourdough Bread - with fermented Dosa batter. Vegan - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Faux Sourdough Bread with fermented Dosa batter. Dosa batter is a fermented lentil and rice batter that tastes a bit like sourdough. Vegan Recipe

itemListElement.name: Faux Sourdough Bread – with fermented Dosa batter. Vegan

@graph.name: Faux Sourdough Bread with fermented Dosa (lentil and rice) batter
@graph.description: Dosa batter is a fermented lentil and rice batter that tastes a bit like sourdough. Vegan Recipe. Makes a 7 by 4.5 inch small loaf
recipeIngredient: 1 Tablespoon non dairy greek yogurt or vegan sour cream (I used SoDelicious plain coconut milk greek yogurt)

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the water and add raw sugar and yeast to it, Mix and let sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the water and add raw sugar and yeast to it, Mix and let sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the dosa batter, greek yogurt, salt and rock salt well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the dosa batter, greek yogurt, salt and rock salt well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the flours, wheat gluten, and yeast mixture and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the flours, wheat gluten, and yeast mixture and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add more bread flour if needed and knead into make a soft dough(5 minutes). The dough will be slightly sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Add more bread flour if needed and knead into make a soft dough(5 minutes). The dough will be slightly sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Let dough sit in a warm place, covered with a towel, for 1.5 hours or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Let dough sit in a warm place, covered with a towel, for 1.5 hours or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Take dough out on a floured working surface and Use a Tablespoon or so bread flour to knead and form a flat rectangle.
recipeInstructions.name: Take dough out on a floured working surface and Use a Tablespoon or so bread flour to knead and form a flat rectangle.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll up the dough tightly and place in a parchment lined bread pan or bagette pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll up the dough tightly and place in a parchment lined bread pan or bagette pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray water on top. Sprinkle flour and coverwith towel. Let rise until almost double.(35-40 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Spray water on top. Sprinkle flour and coverwith towel. Let rise until almost double.(35-40 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Gently lift the parchment and place on a baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Gently lift the parchment and place on a baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F for 25-30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F for 25-30 minutes.
